front.title: Network File System (NFS) Upper Layer Binding To RPC-Over-RDMA

abstract.t: This document specifies the Upper Layer Bindings of Network File System (NFS) protocol versions to RPC-over-RDMA transports. Such Upper Layer Bindings are required to enable RPC-based protocols to use direct data placement when conveying large data payloads on RPC- over-RDMA transports. This document obsoletes RFC 5667.
